Name: Rice Bowl Restaurant
About the game: Nasi Campur (Mixed Rice) is a common and popular food in Indonesia. In the Warung Nasi Campur (Rice Bowl Restaurant) game, you will later sell and meet various types of customers. Cook food according to customer orders, act quickly and upgrade all your stall's facilities to make sales faster and more efficient! Cook & serve your customers! Upgrade your facilites! Act quickly and precisely! Do daily missions! Pay debts and unlock stories! Features: Serve a wide variety of customers Cook a variety of foods Upgrade all facilities Advertise your shop to make it more crowded Complete all daily missions Daily prize collection and lucky spin Unlock interesting stories And most importantly, collect the money and make your Warung Nasi Campur (Rice Bowl Restaurant) the best in the world!
